016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Map;
021import static java.util.Map.entry;
022
023/**
024 * Utility class to look up element names, masses, shortcut names, and ordering.
025 *
026 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
027 * @author Nils Hoffmann
028 */
029public final class Elements {
030
031    public static final double ELECTRON_REST_MASS = 0.00054857990946;
032
033    public static final Map<String, Element> ELEMENT_POSITIONS = Map.ofEntries(
034            entry("C", Element.C),
035            entry("H", Element.H),
036            entry("N", Element.N),
037            entry("O", Element.O),
038            entry("P", Element.P),
039            entry("P'", Element.P32),
040            entry("S", Element.S),
041            entry("F", Element.F),
042            entry("Cl", Element.Cl),
043            entry("Br", Element.Br),
044            entry("I", Element.I),
045            entry("As", Element.As),
046            entry("S'", Element.S34),
047            entry("S''", Element.S33),
048            entry("H'", Element.H2),
049            entry("C'", Element.C13),
050            entry("N'", Element.N15),
051            entry("O'", Element.O17),
052            entry("O''", Element.O18),
053            entry("2H", Element.H2),
054            entry("13C", Element.C13),
055            entry("15N", Element.N15),
056            entry("17O", Element.O17),
057            entry("18O", Element.O18),
058            entry("32P", Element.P32),
059            entry("34S", Element.S34),
060            entry("33S", Element.S33),
061            entry("H2", Element.H2),
062            entry("C13", Element.C13),
063            entry("N15", Element.N15),
064            entry("O17", Element.O17),
065            entry("O18", Element.O18),
066            entry("P32", Element.P32),
067            entry("S34", Element.S34),
068            entry("S33", Element.S33)
069    );
070
071    public static final Map<Element, Double> ELEMENT_MASSES = Map.ofEntries(
072            entry(Element.C, 12.0),
073            entry(Element.H, 1.007825035),
074            entry(Element.N, 14.0030740),
075            entry(Element.O, 15.99491463),
076            entry(Element.P, 30.973762),
077            entry(Element.S, 31.9720707),
078            entry(Element.H2, 2.014101779),
079            entry(Element.C13, 13.0033548378),
080            entry(Element.N15, 15.0001088984),
081            entry(Element.O17, 16.9991315),
082            entry(Element.O18, 17.9991604),
083            entry(Element.P32, 31.973907274),
084            entry(Element.S33, 32.97145876),
085            entry(Element.S34, 33.96786690),
086            entry(Element.F, 18.9984031),
087            entry(Element.Cl, 34.968853),
088            entry(Element.Br, 78.918327),
089            entry(Element.I, 126.904473),
090            entry(Element.As, 74.921595)
091    );
092
093    public static final Map<Element, String> ELEMENT_SHORTCUT = Map.ofEntries(
094            entry(Element.C, "C"),
095            entry(Element.H, "H"),
096            entry(Element.N, "N"),
097            entry(Element.O, "O"),
098            entry(Element.P, "P"),
099            entry(Element.S, "S"),
100            entry(Element.F, "F"),
101            entry(Element.Cl, "Cl"),
102            entry(Element.Br, "Br"),
103            entry(Element.I, "I"),
104            entry(Element.As, "As"),
105            entry(Element.H2, "H'"),
106            entry(Element.C13, "C'"),
107            entry(Element.N15, "N'"),
108            entry(Element.O17, "O'"),
109            entry(Element.O18, "O''"),
110            entry(Element.P32, "P'"),
111            entry(Element.S33, "S'"),
112            entry(Element.S34, "S''")
113    );
114
115    public static final ArrayList<Element> ELEMENT_ORDER = new ArrayList<Element>(List.of(Element.C, Element.H, Element.As, Element.Br, Element.Cl, Element.F, Element.I, Element.N, Element.O, Element.P, Element.S, Element.H2, Element.C13, Element.N15, Element.O17, Element.O18, Element.P32, Element.S33, Element.S34));
116}
